channel.title: News of the now
channel.description: What's happening at the devils' den?

item.title: Commissions
item.description: There is now commission information available! Minor changes throughout the site.

item.title: Pixel art! Scans!
item.description: The Pixel art 1 gallery is here, along with scans and a new instant noodle review. Some changes in the about page too.

item.title: New F&H log
item.description: New F&H log entries and minor changes.

item.title: Early morning update
item.description: Early morning update. Archive 2 is finished, updated gallery CSS and the Fear and Hunger log as well. Some minor changes here and there, compressed lots of images... Might update later today as well.

item.title: Freebies and stuff
item.description: Minor changes and fixes all around the site, new F&H logs, added the miscellaneous and free graphics pages... We have a guestbook now too!

item.title: Fear and Hunger is a game
item.description: Fuck you, two updates in a day. Read our Fear and Hunger log... now!! Oh, there's also new art on Illustration 2.

item.title: Archive 1 is here
item.description: We've been cooking up the Archive 1 for the past few days, and it's finally done! Feel free to give it a look. Content warning: Homestuck.

item.title: New gallery
item.description: Check this shit out: The Illustration 1 gallery has been created. Go check it out, will ya!

item.title: New art, dreamie retrospective
item.description: 3 new pieces of art in Illustration 3, and a lenghty retrospective of a strange Neocities user. Also, RSS?! We hope it works.
